mapper.sql: SELECT T.AM_RECEIVE_ID AS AM_RECEIVE_ID, T.AM_BIZ_ID AS AM_BIZ_ID, T.RECEIVE_DEPT AS RECEIVE_DEPT, ORG.ORGNAME AS RECEIVE_DEPT_NAME, T.RECEIVE_GROUP AS RECEIVE_GROUP, G.GRPNAME AS RECEIVE_GROUP_NAME, T.RECEIVE_TIME AS RECEIVE_TIME, T.IF_RECEIVE AS IF_RECEIVE, T.RECEIVE_REPLY AS RECEIVE_REPLY, T.INVALIDATION_MARK AS INVALIDATION_MARK, T.UPDATE_TIME AS UPDATE_TIME, T.RECEIVE_PERSON_LIST AS RECEIVE_PERSON_LIST, T.DEALER AS DEALER, PS.PNAME AS DEALER_NAME, A.AM_CODE AS AM_CODE, A.AM_TITLE AS AM_TITLE, p.PNAME AS PNAME, o.ORGNAME AS ORGNAME, A.RELEASE_DATE AS RELEASE_DATE, A.CURRENT_STATUS AS CURRENT_STATUS, A.URGENT_LEV AS URGENT_LEV, A.SECRET_LEV AS SECRET_LEV, A.AM_TYPE AS AM_TYPE, A.CONTACT_PHONE AS CONTACT_PHONE, A.OTHER_PHONE AS OTHER_PHONE, A.SMS AS SMS, A.SEND_RANGE AS SEND_RANGE, A.SUMMRY AS SUMMRY, A.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, A .RECEIVE_DEPT_NAME AS NOTICE_DEPT_NAME, A .RECEIVE_GROUP_NAME AS NOTICE_GROUP_NAME, A .CREATE_TIME AS CREATE_TIME FROM AM_BIZ_RECEIVE T LEFT JOIN AM_BIZ_ANNOUNCEMENT A ON T.AM_BIZ_ID = A.AM_BIZ_ID LEFT JOIN OG_ORG O ON A.RELEASE_ORG = O.ORGID LEFT JOIN OG_PERSON P ON A.CREATE_ID = P.PID LEFT JOIN OG_PERSON PS ON T.DEALER = PS.PID LEFT JOIN OG_ORG ORG ON T.RECEIVE_DEPT = ORG.ORGID LEFT JOIN OG_GROUP G ON T.RECEIVE_GROUP = G.GROUPID
mapper.insert: insert into am_biz_receive ( am_receive_Id, am_biz_id, receive_dept, receive_group, receive_Time, if_receive, receive_reply, invalidation_mark, receive_person_list, dealer, update_time )values( #{amReceiveId}, #{amBizId}, #{receiveDept}, #{receiveGroup}, #{receiveTime}, #{ifReceive}, #{receiveReply}, #{invalidationMark}, #{receivePersonList}, #{dealer}, #{editTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT P.PID AS DEALER, P.PNAME AS DEALER_NAME, P.MOBIL_PHONE AS MOBIL_PHONE, O.ORGNAME AS DEALER_DEPT FROM OG_PERSON P LEFT JOIN OG_ORG O ON P.ORGID = O.ORGID LEFT JOIN OG_USER U ON P.PID = U.USERID WHERE P.PID = #{pid} AND U.INVALIDATION_MARK = '1'
